params.name: token_to_idx
params.description: A dict describes the mapping relationship betweentokens and indices.

params.name: unk_token
params.description: The special token for unknow token. Ifno need, it also could be None. Default: None.

params.name: pad_token
params.description: The special token for padding token. Ifno need, it also could be None. Default: None.

params.name: bos_token
params.description: The special token for bos token. If noneed, it also could be None. Default: None.

params.name: eos_token
params.description: The special token for eos token. If noneed, it also could be None. Default: None.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Keyword arguments ending with _token. It can beused to specify further special tokens that will be exposed asattribute of the vocabulary and associated with an index.

return.description: An instance of Vocab generated from the given dictand special tokens.
